here | in the forest | the air is clean and it is extremely peaceful .

output.sentences: The coolest part about the forest were the thick knotted roots and being surrounded by nature.
I felt extremely peaceful in the forest.
There were purple flowers covering all of the trees.
And the sunlight really made the natural colors pop.
I had an awesome adventure that day.
